p: Methods: Critically ill patients with shock who required vasopressors or inotropes were included in a prospective, observational study. Serial measurements of Pv-aCO2 gap, lactate, and Ca-vO2 were obtained at the time of starting the vasopressor/inotrope (time 0), then at times 3, 6 and 12Â hours. The Study protocol was approved by the Hospital Research Ethics Committee (RAC No. 2151 048).
